points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
points.status: "You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Linux Hint, our subsidiaries, affiliates and vendors, and each of their affiliates and related entities and their respective directors, officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims, losses, damages, liabilities, and costs (including but not limited to reasonable attorneys’ fees and court costs), arising out of, relating to or in connection with your use of the Site including, but not limited to, (i) your violation of these Terms of Use, (ii) posting of any content (iii) any harm caused to a third party, or (iv) any other negligent or intentional activity." -Terms of Use

points.title: This service is only available to users over 13
points.status: "This Site is not designed or intended for use by children under 13." -Terms of Use

points.title: Minors under 18 must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
points.status: "If you are under 18, you should use the Site only with involvement of a parent or guardian." -Terms of Use

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
points.status: "Our failure to exercise or enforce any right or provision of these Terms of Use shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision." -Terms of Use

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
points.status: "In the event that any provision of these Terms of use is determined to be unlawful, void or unenforceable, such provision shall nonetheless be enforceable to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, and the unenforceable portion shall be deemed to be severed from these Terms of Use, such determination shall not affect the validity and enforceability of any other remaining provisions." -Terms of Use

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in California, USA
points.status: "These Terms of Use, the Privacy Policy and any separate agreements whereby we provide you services shall be governed by the laws of the State of California." -Terms of Use

points.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
points.status: "Under the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the Sustainable Linux Hint LLC is a Data Controller." -Privacy Policy

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
points.status: "Visitors to our Site who disable cookies will be able to browse certain areas of the Site, but some features may not function." -Privacy Policy

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.status: "We use automated devices and applications, such as Google Analytics, to evaluate usage of our Site." -Privacy Policy

points.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
points.status: "If we are acquired by or merged with another company, if substantially all of our assets are transferred to another company, or as part of a bankruptcy proceeding, we may transfer the information we have collected from you to the other company." -Privacy Policy

points.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
points.status: "Any controversy or claim arising out of, or relating to, this contract or the breach thereof, shall be settled by arbitration, in accordance with the laws of the State of California, then obtaining, of the American Arbitration Association, and judgment upon the award rendered may be entered in any Court having jurisdiction thereof." -Terms of Use

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.
points.status: "TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, ALL CLAIMS AND DISPUTES WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THESE TERMS MUST BE ARBITRATED OR LITIGATED ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS AND NOT ON A CLASS BASIS, AND CLAIMS OF MORE THAN ONE CUSTOMER OR USER CANNOT BE ARBITRATED OR LITIGATED JOINTLY OR CONSOLIDATED WITH THOSE OF ANY OTHER CUSTOMER OR USER." -Terms of Use

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
points.status: "Advertising Cookies. Cookies that are used to collect information about your visit to our Site, the content you have viewed, the links you have followed and information about your browser, device and your IP address. We have set out more details on this below." -Privacy Policy

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and device fingerprinting
points.status: "Clear GIFs are tiny graphics with a unique identifier, similar in function to cookies. In contrast to cookies, which are stored on your computer’s hard drive, clear GIFs are embedded invisibly on web pages. We may use clear GIFs (a.k.a. web beacons, web bugs or pixel tags), in connection with our Site, App and Services to, among other things, track the activities of Site visitors and App users, help us manage content, and compile statistics about Site and App usage. We and our third party service providers also use clear GIFs in HTML emails to our customers, to help us track email response rates, identify when our emails are viewed, and track whether our emails are forwarded." -Privacy Policy
